name: Eco Sandbox
description:
This is eco sandbox, a simple ecosystem simulation made in unity.

please note this is a very early prototype of this game so expect MANY bugs!

All entities and what they do:

-Food (red cube, worms can eat this to gain a small stat boost and will make the worm duplicate, predators drop this when they die from running out of prey, acts as the heal food does for the worm but for the predators)

-Heal food (green cube, worms drop this upon death, upon a worm eating this it will gain a small stat boost but will not duplicate, when a predator eats this it will gain a stat boost and duplicate)

-Poison (black cubes, anything that eats this will take alot of damage and will have its stats dropped slightly)

-Worm (bean lookin guys, will randomly wander around until coming in range with food or heal cubes, will constantly lose health and will die once they run out of food or heal cubes, 3 main stats: health, speed, range)

-Elephant(worms evolve into this once getting a high enough health which they can get from eating food and heal food, live and duplicate similar to worm)

-Predator(spike things, similar to worms they will wander around until coming in range of worms where they will chase it down and drain its health, the worm will drop a heal cube which predators use to duplicate, 4 main stats: health, speed, range, damage)

-For the 3 animals (worm, elephant and predator) the health stat does not get transferred to offspring

Only the strongest generations will survive! (animals can go extinct)
